images.copyright: Guanaco mother and newborn baby in grassland, La Pampa Province, Argentina (© Gabriel Rojo/Minden Pictures)
images.title: Happy Mother's Day!
images.caption: Happy Mother's Day!
images.desc: Mothers, the perennial source of love and comfort, may not wear capes, but they are the true heroes in our lives. In today's image, we see a mother and baby guanaco, a relative of the llama, roaming the vast grasslands of La Pampa, Argentina. Just like a human mom, a guanaco female is fiercely protective of her child, also known as a 'chulengo.'

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
